post_detail.description:
Background
Click 3X worked with McGarryBowen and Verizon to shoot and finish approximately 30 videos, which showcased the new Droid interface.  

Execution:
Directed by Click 3X Director Juan Delcan, we filmed all 30 spots in just 2 days. Then, we color corrected, designed and animated all the videos in house, under a complex timeline.
post_detail.title: Verizon Case Study
